pkgmetadata.longdescription: Collapses Levels, Computes Information Value and WoE // Contains functions to help in selecting and exploring features ( or variables ) in binary classification problems. Provides functions to compute and display information value and weight of evidence (WoE) of the variables , and to convert numeric variables to categorical variables by binning. Functions are also provided to determine which levels ( or categories ) of a categorical variable can be collapsed (or combined ) based on their response rates. The functions provided only work for binary classification problems.
